title: Chickpeak "Chicken Salad" Sandwiches
steps: Create the sauce: combine hummus, lemon juice, garlic, soy milk, and 0.5 T dill.
In a large bowl, mash chickpeas in a large bowl for texture.
To make the filling, add to the chickpeas: sunflower seeds, onion, tahini, Dijon mustard, maple syrup, and remaining (2 T) dill.
Slather the sauce on one slice of bread. On the other, layer the filling, spinach, apple slices, and the first slice.
